meaningMnemonic: This is a single kanji with an い on the end, meaning you know it's probably an adjective. What's the adjective form of <kanji>fierce</kanji> and <kanji>violent</kanji>? <vocabulary>Fierce</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>violent</vocabulary>! That's <vocabulary>intense</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: What is <vocabulary>fierce</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>violent</vocabulary>? That old <reading>hag</reading> (はげ). Imagine her coming at you attacking you violently!
